attributes.action: Let the people decide on the future relationship between Britain and the European Union and not pass through new treaties without consulting the voters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ever since Britain joined the Common Market in 1973, more and more powers have been handed to Brussels without the voters being granted a referendum. Now that huge elements of the EU Constitution are being brought in by the new 'Reform Treaty', it is time for the British people to have their say on our future relationship with the EU. I say, Let the People Decide.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
